Articles.Content:
It would be cool to have dust scattering on the Mun (and other bodies) when landing and taking off. I'm no programmer, but based on other things the mod developers have come up with, I can't imagine this is impossible or even that tough... Thoughts?

Something like this?

http://youtu.be/e6GOe1qgtz4?t=1m35s

Yes!!

Sorry if this is a necro.
